languages.text: "За тысячи лет я познал, сколь переменчива судьба, и как часто то, что я считал поражениями, оборачивалось моими величайшими триумфами. Я научился вверять свою судьбу воле Меняющего Пути и следовать зову Истины. Нет, я не держу зла, {name}. Твое восхождение — один из моих величайших триумфов".

"Over thousands of years, I have learned how inconstant fate can be and how often its turns that I perceive as defeats reveal themselves as my resounding victories. I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."
languages.original_text: "За тысячи лет я познал, сколь переменчива судьба, и как часто то, что я считал поражениями, оборачивалось моими величайшими триумфами. Я научился вверять свою судьбу воле Меняющего Пути и следовать зову Истины. Нет, я не держу зла, {name}. Твое восхождение — один из моих величайших триумфов".

I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

"Over thousands of years, I have learned how inconstant fate can be and how often its turns that I perceive as defeats reveal themselves as my resounding victories. I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

languages.text: « Au fil des millénaires, j'ai appris à quel point le destin pouvait se montrer inconstant et bien souvent, ce que je percevais comme un échec s'est révélé une victoire retentissante. J'ai appris à remettre mon sort entre les mains de l'Architecte du Changement et à suivre l'appel de la vérité. Je ne vous veux aucun mal, {name}. Votre ascension est l'un de mes plus grands triomphes. »
languages.original_text: "Over thousands of years, I have learned how inconstant fate can be and how often its turns that I perceive as defeats reveal themselves as my resounding victories. I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

traits.locale_text: « Au fil des millénaires, j'ai appris à quel point le destin pouvait se montrer inconstant et bien souvent, ce que je percevais comme un échec s'est révélé une victoire retentissante. J'ai appris à remettre mon sort entre les mains de l'Architecte du Changement et à suivre l'appel de la vérité. Je ne vous veux aucun mal, {name}. Votre ascension est l'un de mes plus grands triomphes. »

languages.text: «Durante miles de años, he comprendido la inconsistencia del destino y la frecuencia con la que los giros que percibo como derrotas revelan ser victorias aplastantes. He aprendido a dejar mi destino en manos de El Que Cambia las Cosas y a seguir la llamada de la Verdad. No hay rencor, {name}. Tu ascenso es uno de mis mayores triunfos».
languages.original_text: "Over thousands of years, I have learned how inconstant fate can be and how often its turns that I perceive as defeats reveal themselves as my resounding victories. I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

traits.locale_text: «Durante miles de años, he comprendido la inconsistencia del destino y la frecuencia con la que los giros que percibo como derrotas revelan ser victorias aplastantes. He aprendido a dejar mi destino en manos de El Que Cambia las Cosas y a seguir la llamada de la Verdad. No hay rencor, {name}. Tu ascenso es uno de mis mayores triunfos».

languages.text: 「何千年もの間、私は運命というものがいかに不安定なものであるのかを学んできた。また、私が敗北と感じた運命の転回が私の朗々たる勝利となることの多さも知った。私は運命を方途を違える者の意志に委ね、真実の呼びかけに従うことを学んだのだ。そこに悪意はない、{name}よ。お前の昇華は、私の最大の勝利の1つだ」
languages.original_text: "Over thousands of years, I have learned how inconstant fate can be and how often its turns that I perceive as defeats reveal themselves as my resounding victories. I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

traits.locale_text: 「何千年もの間、私は運命というものがいかに不安定なものであるのかを学んできた。また、私が敗北と感じた運命の転回が私の朗々たる勝利となることの多さも知った。私は運命を方途を違える者の意志に委ね、真実の呼びかけに従うことを学んだのだ。そこに悪意はない、{name}よ。お前の昇華は、私の最大の勝利の1つだ」

languages.text: “几千年过去了，我理解了命运的无常，也意识到乍看之下的失败往往会成为我伟大的胜利。我已经学会了将我的命运置于诡道之主的意志之中，追随真理的召唤。我对你没有任何恨意，{name}，你的擢升是我最伟大的胜利之一。”
languages.original_text: "Over thousands of years, I have learned how inconstant fate can be and how often its turns that I perceive as defeats reveal themselves as my resounding victories. I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

traits.locale_text: “几千年过去了，我理解了命运的无常，也意识到乍看之下的失败往往会成为我伟大的胜利。我已经学会了将我的命运置于诡道之主的意志之中，追随真理的召唤。我对你没有任何恨意，{name}，你的擢升是我最伟大的胜利之一。”

languages.text: "Ich habe in tausenden von Jahren gelernt, wie wankelmütig das Schicksal sein kann und wie oft sich seine Wendungen, die ich als Niederlagen erachte, als triumphale Siege erweisen. Ich habe gelernt, mein Schicksal in die Hände des Wandlers der Wege zu legen und dem Ruf der Wahrheit zu folgen. Es ist nichts Arges daran, {name}. Euer Aufstieg ist einer meiner größten Triumphe."
languages.original_text: "Over thousands of years, I have learned how inconstant fate can be and how often its turns that I perceive as defeats reveal themselves as my resounding victories. I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe in tausenden von Jahren gelernt, wie wankelmütig das Schicksal sein kann und wie oft sich seine Wendungen, die ich als Niederlagen erachte, als triumphale Siege erweisen. Ich habe gelernt, mein Schicksal in die Hände des Wandlers der Wege zu legen und dem Ruf der Wahrheit zu folgen. Es ist nichts Arges daran, {name}. Euer Aufstieg ist einer meiner größten Triumphe."

languages.text: "Binlerce yıl boyunca kaderin ne kadar tutarsız olabileceğini ve benim mağlubiyet olarak algıladığım şeylerin aslında nasıl da görkemli zaferlerim olduğunun ortaya çıkabileceğini öğrendim. Kaderimi Yolları Değiştiren'in iradesine bırakmayı ve Hakikat'in çağrısını takip etmeyi öğrendim. Kin duymuyorum {name}. Miracın, en büyük başarılarımdan biridir."
languages.original_text: "Over thousands of years, I have learned how inconstant fate can be and how often its turns that I perceive as defeats reveal themselves as my resounding victories. I have learned to put my fate in the will of the Changer of Ways and follow the call of the Truth. There is no malice, {name}. Your ascension is one of my greatest triumphs."
